@wp.kernel
def rand_expr_pollxt(data: wp.array(dtype=float)):
    tid = wp.tid()
    v0 = data[tid]
    v1 = 0.0
    v2 = 1.0
    tmp = 0.0
    v1 = (0.77 / wp.abs(v2))
    v2 = ((wp.exp(v1 + 0.36) - (v2 + 0.01 * v2 + 0.93)) * (wp.exp(v1 + 0.59) * 0.52))
    v0 = v1
    tmp = v2
    tmp = v1
    data[tid] = v0
